text: Lohnstorf was a municipality in Bern-Mittelland in the canton of Bern in Switzerland. On 1 January 2020, the municipalities Kirchenthurnen, Lohnstorf and MÃ¼hlethurnen joined together to become the new municipality Thurnen.Amtliches Gemeindeverzeichnis der Schweiz published by the Swiss Federal Statistical Office accessed 31 December 2019 == References == ==Other websites== Category:Former municipalities in Bern-Mittelland
